name: Mix Oil® Aqua powder
description: Mix Oil ® Aqua powder dairy is a higly concentrated mix of essential oils designed and created for all farm animals and pets and may be considered a multi-purpose flavoring since not only it improves the taste of food, but also naturally works as a digestive and stimulant. Mix Oil ® Aqua powder dairy exploits the characteristics and synergies of all its components to improve the performance and health of animals.
